com.quantcomponents.algo
Interface ITradingAgentBindingManager

All Known Subinterfaces:
ITradingManager
public interface ITradingAgentBindingManager

Interface to manage algorithm input bindings

See Also:
ITradingHierarchyManager

Method Detail

createBinding

TradingAgentBindingHandle createBinding(TradingAgentConfigurationHandle tradingAgentConfigurationHandle,
                                        Map<String,? extends ISeries<Date,Double,ISeriesPoint<Date,Double>>> inputSeries,
                                        String name)
Creates an algorithm binding to input series, and returns a handle to it

Parameters:
tradingAgentConfigurationHandle - handle to algorithm configuration
inputSeries - the input series to the algorithm instance, mapped to the input names found in ISeriesProcessorFactory.getInputSeriesNames()
name - a readable name to be shown in the UI
Returns:
a handle to the binding created

getBindingInputSeries

Map<String,ISeries<Date,Double,ISeriesPoint<Date,Double>>> getBindingInputSeries(TradingAgentBindingHandle bindingHandle)
Returns the input series of the binding as set in the previous method

Parameters:
bindingHandle - the handle to the algorithm binding
Returns:
a map of input series to their names

removeBinding

void removeBinding(TradingAgentBindingHandle bindingHandle)
Remove a binding

Parameters:
bindingHandle - the handle to the binding to be removed
